Council_Room : Costs: 5: 10 Left: "+4 Cards and +1 Buys | Each other player draws a card." Cutpurse : Costs: 4: 10 Left: "+2 Coins | Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper)." Embargo : Costs: 2: 10 Left: "+2 Coins | Trash this card, put Embargo token on a Supply pile. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3 coins more than it." Village : Costs: 3: 10 Left: "+1 Card | +1 Action" Smithy : Costs: 4: 10 Left: "+3 Cards" Salvager : Costs: 4: 10 Left: "+1 Buy | Trash a card from your hand. + # of coins equal to its cost."
